description: A rapid development framework based on .NET Core with the latest .NET Core SDK LTS version (currently .NET Core 3.1). The OSharp framework highly automates the following modules of ASP.NET Core: configuration, dependency injection, Logging, caching, entity framework, MVC / WebAPI, identity authentication, permission authorization, etc. OSharp also standardizes a set of business implementation code and operation processes, making the .NET Core framework easier to apply to the development of actual projects.
